description:
Create snippets of text for support responses, sales outreach, or even common emails and save them in TextExpander.


What's new in TextExpander 8.3.1
- Fix for Inline Search Expansions in Excel
- Improved window focus tracking
- Improved communication with Chrome Extension
- Fix Inline Search and Quick Actions expansion within a fill-in window
- Improved Native Windows Notifications
- Various other fixes and improvements.
